roleset.name: to surpise
roleset.note: FLABBERGAST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'flabbergast' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from flabbergast.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: `` I-3 was flabbergasted [*-3] , '' Tatsuhara Yamane , head of the bureau , was quoted [*-1]by Kyodo news service as [*-4] saying [*T*-2] .
